text: We are more than just flesh and bones. There's a certain spiritual nature and something of the mind that we can't measure. We can't find it. With all our sophisticated equipment, we cannot monitor or define it, and yet it's there.
author: Benjamin Carson

text: Nature is a petrified magic city.
author: Novalis

text: It is a law of human nature that in victory even the coward may boast of his prowess, while defeat injures the reputation even of the brave.
author: Sallust

text: The possibility of a scientific treatment of history means a wider experience, a greater maturity of practical reason, and finally a fuller realization of certain basic ideas regarding the nature of life and time.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

text: Cruelty is a part of nature, at least of human nature, but it is the one thing that seems unnatural to us.
author: Robinson Jeffers
